SEARCH
Package cycling

Class Stage

java.lang.Object
cycling.Stage
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class Stage extends Object implements Serializable
Represents a stage within a cycling race, including details such as the stage type, length, start time, and associated checkpoints. It also manages stage results for riders, including their times and points awarded based on their performance at various checkpoints within the stage.
Version:
1.0
Author:
Olly Johnson and Laith Al Qudah
See Also:

    • Stage

      public Stage(int id, String name, Race race, String description, double length, LocalDateTime startTime, StageType stageType)
      Constructs a stage with specified attributes.
      Parameters:
      id - Unique identifier for the stage.
      name - Name of the stage.
      race - The race this stage is part of.
      description - Description of the stage.
      length - Length of the stage in kilometers.
      startTime - Start time of the stage.
      stageType - Type of the stage (e.g., flat, mountain, time trial).

      results - The results object containing the rider's times and rankings.

      Returns:
      An array of LocalTime objects representing the rider's times at checkpoints.

      public int[] getRiderRanks()

      An array of rider IDs in the order of their rank.

      public LocalTime[] getRankedAdjustedElapsedTimes()
      Retrieves the adjusted elapsed times for riders in the stage, sorted by rank.
      Returns:
      An array of LocalTime objects representing the sorted adjusted times.

    • getPointsDistributionByStageType

      private int[] getPointsDistributionByStageType()
      Calculates the points distribution based on the type of the stage.
      Returns:
      An array of points corresponding to stage rankings.

    • getOrderedPoints

      public int[] getOrderedPoints()
      Calculates and returns the total points for each rider, ordered by their rank.
      Returns:
      An array of points corresponding to each rider's total in the stage.

    • getCheckpointPointsDistributionByType

      private int[] getCheckpointPointsDistributionByType(CheckpointType type)
      Determines the points distribution for different types of checkpoints.
      Parameters:
      type - The type of checkpoint (e.g., C4, C3, C2, C1, HC, SPRINT).
      Returns:
      An array representing the points distribution for the specified checkpoint type.

      Returns:

      public StageType getStageType()
      Retrieves the stage type.
      Returns:
      The type of the stage (e.g., FLAT, MEDIUM_MOUNTAIN, HIGH_MOUNTAIN, TT).
